1.title: Hephaetus
1.plot: Angela and her older sister Elizabeth are ecstatic to be out of the house and playing in the woods. They don't want to heed the warning of their overprotective father, Dan, that everything isn't as safe as it seems.

2.title: Ares
2.plot: Professor Scott Jackson hosts his weekly show The Universe in a nearly empty studio with a mysterious stranger looking on.

3.title: Janus
3.plot: Angela Summer, now grown up, visits her dissertation adviser, Jenny Randall, hoping to quit the Philosophy program and move on with her life. But Jenny has other plans.

4.title: Polaris
4.plot: Angela confronts her father, Dan, about her missing sister, Elizabeth, and finds out that he has been up to far more than he's been letting on.

5.title: Hydra
5.plot: The lights come on in the television studio where Dr. Scott Jackson has been recording the latest episode of The Universe and the mysterious director is revealed.

6.title: Andromeda
6.plot: Angela stumbles upon a woman dancing in a mysterious garden.

7.title: Gemini
7.plot: Angela finds herself in a bind in a strange place with no one to turn to for help. Then a familiar face appears in the woods.

8.title: Pleiades
8.plot: Elizabeth reads a story that incites Angela to dream about her own powerful future, but not everyone agrees that the sisters should choose their own destinies.

9.title: Atlas
9.plot: What's really at stake is finally revealed.

imdb.plot outline: Angela is on a quest to save her long lost sister. To accomplish her goal she needs to locate the pieces of a time-altering mystical weapon known as the Music of the Spheres in a world dictated by the teachings of the ancient philosopher Pythagoras. Time is running out too. Angela's journey has begun to open the gates between the worlds and if she's not quick an invasion of ancient mythic beings could destroy the balance in the multiverse forever.
imdb.title: Music of the Spheres
plot: Angela is on a quest to locate the pieces of a time-altering mystical weapon known as the _Music of the Spheres_ (qv) in a world dictated by the teachings of the ancient philosopher Pythagoras.::Ruth Gregory

Angela is on a quest to save her long lost sister. To accomplish her goal she needs to locate the pieces of a time-altering mystical weapon known as the _Music of the Spheres_ (qv) in a world dictated by the teachings of the ancient philosopher Pythagoras. Time is running out too. Angela's journey has begun to open the gates between the worlds and if she's not quick an invasion of ancient mythic beings could destroy the balance in the multiverse forever.::Ruth Gregory

_Music of the Spheres_ (qv) is an innovative fantasy series created by filmmaker Ruth Gregory and shot using a 360 degree camera; allowing viewers the ability to become active participants in the story. It is the first series to completely tell its story using 360 degree technology; blazing a new trail for motion picture storytelling.::_Music of the Spheres_ (qv)
